Zheng Yu joins as postdoctoral researcher

September, 2022

Dr. Zheng Yu joins the group as a postdoctoral researcher from the MSE Ph.D Program at the University of Wisconsin, Madison.

September 2022 – Dr. Zheng Yu joins the group as a postdoctoral researcher from the MSE Ph.D Program at the University of Wisconsin, Madison, where he worked with Bu Wang. Welcome Zheng!
